books.author: by Sheryl Sandberg with Nell Scovell
books.description: The chief operating officer of Facebook urges women to pursue their careers without ambivalence.
books.name: LEAN IN

books.author: by Eben Alexander
books.description: A neurosurgeon recounts his near death experience during a coma from bacterial meningitis.
books.name: PROOF OF HEAVEN

books.author: by Mary Roach
books.description: A science writer’s pilgrimage down the digestive tract; by the author of “Stiff,” “Spook,” “Bonk” and “Packing for Mars.”
books.name: GULP

books.author: by Ben C. Carson and Candy Carson
books.description: A doctor explores what makes America great.
books.name: AMERICA THE BEAUTIFUL

books.author: by Cheryl Strayed
books.description: A woman’s account of a life-changing 1,100-mile hike along the Pacific Crest Trail during the summer of 1995.
books.name: WILD

books.author: by Chris Kyle with Scott McEwen and Jim DeFelice
books.description: A member of the Navy Seals who had the most career sniper kills in United States military history discusses his childhood, his marriage and his battlefield experiences during the Iraq war. Kyle was recently shot to death in Texas.
books.name: AMERICAN SNIPER

books.author: by David Stockman
books.description: A revisionist account of economic history since the New Deal by President Reagan’s former budget director frames his account of the current crisis.
books.name: GREAT DEFORMATION

books.author: by Glennon Doyle Melton
books.description: Reflections on marriage, motherhood, faith, addiction and recovery; from the author of the blog Momastery.com.
books.name: CARRY ON, WARRIOR

books.author: by Frank McCourt
books.description: An Irish-American writer recalls his childhood amid the miseries of Limerick; originally published in 1996.
books.name: ANGELA'S ASHES

books.author: by Kelly Oxford
books.description: Humorous stories from the “Twitter Mom,” now a Hollywood writer.
books.name: EVERYTHING IS PERFECT WHEN YOU'RE A LIAR

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the assassination of John F. Kennedy.
books.name: KILLING KENNEDY

books.author: by Debbie Reynolds and Dorian Hannaway
books.description: A second memoir by the actress, singer and dancer presents stories about her show-business friends, her man and money troubles, and her children.
books.name: UNSINKABLE

books.author: by Susannah Cahalan
books.description: A medical mystery in which doctors struggle to discover why a young reporter suddenly experiences seizures, hallucinations and eventually near catatonia.
books.name: BRAIN ON FIRE

books.author: by Daniel Kahneman
books.description: The winner of the Nobel in economic science discusses how we make choices in business and personal life and when we can and cannot trust our intuitions.
books.name: THINKING, FAST AND SLOW

books.author: by Susan Cain
books.description: Introverts — one-third of the population — are undervalued in American society.
books.name: QUIET
